short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the FiveThirtyEight House races, ranked by how competitive they are, and donate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a new section to the FiveThirtyEight House forecast that displays the top 15 most competitive districts, along with links to ActBlue to donate.

Something I've been missing so I threw together a simple implementation over the weekend.
